concept.definition: The order has a normal priority .
The order should be acted on as soon as possible.

description: The clinical priority of a diagnostic order.
name: DiagnosticOrderPriority

text.div:
DiagnosticOrderPriority

The clinical priority of a diagnostic order.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/diagnostic-order-priority defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
routine RoutineThe order has a normal priority .
urgent UrgentThe order should be urgently.
stat StatThe order is time-critical.
asap ASAPThe order should be acted on as soon as possible.
